about_the_game:
浩浩荡荡的关东联军，如今已作鸟兽散，而属于关东诸侯的时代才刚刚开始。四世三公的汝南袁氏之后——袁绍和袁术，北地的宗室长者与白马将军，日后名扬天下的两位枭雄，被李傕郭汜逐出长安的吕布，正各自纵横捭阖，逐鹿中原。
The vast Anti-Dong Zhuo's Coalition has now scattered, and the era belonging to the warlords of East of Hangu Pass has just begun. Yuan Shao and Yuan Shu, the descendants of the Yuan Clan of Ru'nan; the sage of Han Dynasty's Court and White Horse General of the northern land; Cao Cao and Liu Bei, two heroes who would later become famous throughout the history; and Lü Bu, who had just been expelled from Chang'an City by Li Jue and Guo Si, are now all fighting to win the stakes in the Central Plain of China.

  • 精心设计的关卡：从青州到中原，自官渡至白狼山，体验美术风格各异的不同关卡，自由搭配将领、兵装与兵种，并完成各式各样的任务。
    Well-designed levels: From Qing State to the Central Plain, from Guandu to Bailang Mountain, experience different levels with different art styles, freely mix and match the generals, armours, and troops to complete a variety of quests.

  • 全新的挑战模式与据点交流：与不同的历史人物在战前交流，发掘、了解他们背后的故事。挑战模式则通过高难度的关卡设计，在同一张地图中以不同的视角讲述发生在本篇之外的故事。
    Challenge Mode and Communication: Communicate with different historical figures before battle to discover and understand their backstories. The Challenge Mode will give a highly difficult level design that tells the story from different perspectives on the same map.

  • 参考大量原典与研究著述而编写的文本：本作将于《后汉稽异录》广受好评的剧本基础上，进一步以新的视角为您讲述这段不可谓不波澜壮阔的前三国时代的故事。
    Script with Reference: Based on the well-received script of "Obscure Chronicle of Dynasty", this game will further tell the story of the former Three Kingdoms era from a new perspective based on a large number of canonical texts and research works, which is not to say that it is not a dramatic one.

  • 可切换的语言风格：同时提供「常规」与「浅易」两种语言风格，前者在白话文的基础上使用了大量模仿古代的句式，后者则替换掉了大多数偏向文言的词汇及语法，您可以在典雅与简单易懂之间自由切换。
    Switchable language styles (Only for Chinese): Two language styles are provided, "Conventional" and "Simple", the former uses a lot of vocabulary and sentence patterns imitating ancient times on the basis of the Ancient Chinese (Wen-yan 文言), while the latter replaces most of the vocabulary and grammar to fit modern Chinese Language, so you can freely switch between elegance and simplicity.

  • 动漫风格的三国世界：数十张娘化的精美立绘，Q版人物，以及结合2D纸片与3D高低差的地形，以动漫+中国风的形式为您带来全新的视听体验。
    Anime-style, but Three Kingdoms: Dozens of nymphetically beautiful stand-up drawings, anime-style characters, and terrain combining 2D paper and 3D height difference, bringing you a brand-new audio-visual experience in the form of anime+Chinese style.
